#summary API Basic usage examples to get people started till we get some real docs.
#labels samples,examples,Featured

= Basic Usage  =
{{{
var today = Date.today();

var birthdate = Date.on(2007, 3, 28); // Uses real month, not zero-based index
birthdate.getMonth(); // Equally sensible
=> 3 

birthdate.getJSMonth(); // For when you need the legacy behavior
=> 2

function isAdult(birthdate) {
  var eighteenth_birthday = birthdate.addYears(18);
  return eighteenth_birthday.onOrBefore(Date.today());
}
}}}
